section.title: 3.2: Quest cape, quality of life
section.chapterTitle: Chapter 3: The longest home stretch you've ever seen

steps.title: Step 20
steps.description: Cash your banked herblore XP, using MOGs force spawning at Ardy. Make some staminas for future use. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IuqyCbHuxu8 (newest force spawning marks of grace example video). Older sources: Force spawning marks of grace on Ardy rooftop and Force Spawning Marks of Grace [Explanation + Example] show the basics of force spawning marks of grace. However, we have since learned of the exact mechanics of spawning marks ( https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Mark_of_grace#Obtaining_marks_of_grace ), allowing for the best possible method below. The method is stunningly simple: Every 3 to 9.5 minutes (inclusive, lower is better but don't be too quick) , do exactly one lap at Ardougne rooftops, then do other activities at your leisure. A mark of grace will spawn upon finishing the lap (and you will pick it up on your next lap) 75% of the time. When you are done, do one more lap (so a back to back lap to finish off) to grab the potential final mark. If no mark spawned on a certain lap don't panic, just keep to the rhythm. Using this strategy you get a mark of grace per 1057.3 xp on average at Ardougne, so that going from level 98 to 99 with this method gives approximately 1160 marks of grace or 2900 (4)-dose staminas (note: the real number is lower because of agility quest xp rewards collected after level 98) .

steps.title: Step 22
steps.description: 3t4s mine 20k sand (for level 93 crafting) or 70k sand (for level 99 crafting), buying all the sand (buy bucket packs first to match the amount required) 3 tick sandstone mining at new spot (easier method) . Super glassmake all the sand with previously farmed giant seaweed. If you aren't 91 thieving yet, arteglass the molten glass until you are.

steps.title: Step 23
steps.description: Optional but recommended: now that you have daeyalt mining https://streamable.com/it7kry unlocked and the full raiments of the eye set, there is almost nothing holding you back from training runecrafting, e.g. with spellbook swap Vile Vigour fletching (multiskill) ZMI runecrafting (or non-spellbook swap stamina potions). It is macroefficient to complete level 90 or 95 runecrafting sooner rather than later, to have access to ample wrath runes for offering spells during slayer. Weave in the runecrafting grind at your own convenience, immediately is recommended. Blow glass while ZMI crafting, then when out of glass swap over to fletching instead (buy broad arrowhead packs and arrow shafts as needed). It is meta to sell some of the runes you craft. Sell laws past the first 10,000 and nature runes past the first 30,000 (note: you may wish to keep more runes for your own purposes) to Ali Morissane. Optionally also sell chaos runes for tokkul to TzHaar-Mej-Roh, buying onyx bolt tips and uncut gems with the tokkul (this requires a fire cape). You can multiskill barbarian mixes with ZMI by teleporting to a bank (sepulchre recommended) after crafting the runes, filling your inv with a 50/50 mix of caviar and 2-dose potions, teleporting to Ourania, then making them as you run to the ladder. Then bank again at Eniola to grab the essence and fletching/crafting materials for your next inventory of ZMI.

Optionally also sell chaos runes for tokkul to TzHaar-Mej-Roh, buying onyx bolt tips and uncut gems with the tokkul (this requires a fire cape).

You can multiskill barbarian mixes with ZMI by teleporting to a bank (sepulchre recommended) after crafting the runes, filling your inv with a 50/50 mix of caviar and 2-dose potions, teleporting to Ourania, then making them as you run to the ladder.
Then bank again at Eniola to grab the essence and fletching/crafting materials for your next inventory of ZMI.

section.title: 3.2: Quest cape, quality of life
section.chapterTitle: Chapter 3: The longest home stretch you've ever seen

steps.title: Step 24
steps.description: If you only went for one sceptre earlier, do Pyramid Plunder for a second sceptre. Compared to last time the only things that changed are: Use the teleport on your sceptre instead of entering the pyramid. You no longer need to hop for a North mummy. There is/was a bug where you have to leave the previous run instead of teleport out to avoid broken timers. The rooms change little: Room 7: loot the urns as you encounter them (south to north, then along the south wall around the chest). Open the doors clockwise starting east. If you're level 91 or above, make sure to go for chest when the timer hits around 2:10. Room 8: grab the east urns first, then trace back south and go clockwise. Grab the chest before or after the last urn and exit through the northeast open door. The most important trick to getting high xp and sceptre rates is not using the full 5 minutes per pp game - most of the time you should be getting laps of 4:40 or faster while opening all 81+ urns (and skipping urns in the second to last room if you can't keep this pace). This also means you'll run out of synch with other people playing PP, so while you can make use of information from doors others have opened for you (and skip them) while in the same room it's not going to be huge most of the time. Still open chests starting at level 51 room.

This also means you'll run out of synch with other people playing PP, so while you can make use of information from doors others have opened for you (and skip them) while in the same room it's not going to be huge most of the time.

steps.title: Step 25
steps.description: Once you have enough mahogany planks from Misc (or chop teaks at your own convenience), train construction to level 83 with mahogany benches (or tables, slightly lower xp but also lower effort). This takes approximately 10.5k mahogany logs (47 days of Misc at 10 workers). Once done, build/upgrade the following: Ornate rejuvenation pool (requires boostable 87 herblore, along with some Zulrah kills for the scales and antidote++) Ornate jewellery box (if you have the dragonstones) Gilded magic wardrobe (optional) Fairy ring (purchase a second superior garden) Marble cape rack Occult altar Mahogany treasure chest The total item requirements for this are: 1 Pharaoh's sceptre, 10000 astral runes, Ancient signet, Lunar signet, 5 limestone bricks, 5 buckets of water, 1000 soul runes, 1000 body runes, 10 stamina potions(4), 10 prayer potions(4), 3 marble blocks, 10 super restores(4), 9 gold leaves, 10 anti-venom(4), 1000 blood runes, 10 mushrooms, 1 Fairy enchantment, 4 mahogany planks, 5 combat bracelets(4), 5 skills necklaces(4), 8 Amulets of glory(4) and 8 Rings of wealth(5). Note: this list assumes you didn't have any pool previously built.
